TopicTitle: LightYear Tire Co. not in manufacurer list

Articles.Content: So not sure if this is technically a bug, but I noticed while setting up a challenge between some friends that when you use the "sort by manufacturer" function in the VAB/SPH, LightYear Tire Company isn't listed. It should be right between Kerlington and Maxo in the list (it's alphabetical), but it's absent. It's a relatively minor thing, but I figured I'd post it anyway to see if maybe it was just my game, or if others have this issue too; and if so how to fix it.

interesting

Edited August 17, 2018 by martyns1234
Also worth mentioning I'm playing fully stock, with the Making History expansion.
